title: user registration and login
description: Test the user registration and login endpoints to ensure successful account creation, secure password encryption, and JWT token issuance for authenticated access.

title: restaurant management crud operations
description: Verify CRUD operations on restaurant endpoints including listing, details retrieval, creation, update, and deletion with proper authorization for restaurant owners.

title: menu item management
description: Test the menu item endpoints for full CRUD functionality ensuring only authorized restaurant owners can manage menu items.

title: shopping cart functionality
description: Validate shopping cart endpoints for adding items, updating quantities, removing items, and retrieving cart state with persistence.

title: order processing and tracking
description: Test order creation, status updates, retrieval of order history, and order tracking endpoints for both customers and restaurants.

title: payment gateway integration
description: Verify payment processing through the Chapa payment gateway including payment initiation, callback handling, and transaction status updates.

title: admin dashboard management
description: Test admin endpoints for managing users, restaurants, orders, support tickets, and analytics data with appropriate access control.

title: search and filtering functionality
description: Validate search and filtering endpoints to ensure accurate and relevant results for restaurants and menu items based on user queries and filters.

title: promo code application and validation
description: Test promo code endpoints to verify correct application of discounts, validation of usage limits, and expiration handling.

title: security middleware enforcement
description: Verify security middleware including rate limiting, input validation, and JWT authentication to prevent unauthorized access and protect against attacks.
